00018 #ifndef __VOTCA_MD2QM_SQLITEWRITE_H
00019 #define __VOTCA_MD2QM_SQLITEWRITE_H
00020 
00021 #include <votca/ctp/qmcalculator.h>
00022 #include <votca/ctp/statesaversqlite.h>
00023 
00024 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00025 
00042 class SQLiteWriter : public QMCalculator {
00043 public:
00044     SQLiteWriter() {};
00045     virtual ~SQLiteWriter() {};
00046 
00047     const char *Description() { return "Writes out data to sqlite3 format"; }
00048 
00049     void Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options);
00050     bool EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top);
00051     void EndEvaluate(QMTopology *top);
00052 
00053 private:
00054     StateSaverSQLite _saver;
00055 };
00056 
00057 inline void SQLiteWriter::Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options)
00058 {
00059     _saver.Open(*top, "state_calculator.db");
00060 }
00061 
00062 inline bool SQLiteWriter::EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top)
00063 {
00064     _saver.WriteFrame();
00065     return true;
00066 }
00067 
00068 inline void SQLiteWriter::EndEvaluate(QMTopology *top)
00069 {
00070     _saver.Close();
00071 }
00072 
00073 }}
00074 
00075 #endif
